title: 1 Bed Apt - Washer/Dryer, Spacious Bathroom and Walk-in Closet
neighborhood: 505 N. Figueroa St., Los Angeles, CA
posting_body: Imagine a home where the fine art of living has been perfected.
Welcome to The Orsini, home to the best apartments in downtown Los Angeles.
From the moment you enter the elegant Mediterranean inspired 2-story foyer at The Orsini, you will realize that you have come home to a new experience in luxury apartment living.
We are in the heart of Los Angeles, California and the pulse of extraordinary living.
Enjoy a short commute to the LA Fashion District, Staples Center, Disney Concert Hall, Chinatown and all the amazing dining and glamorous shopping that living in Los Angeles has to offer.
-Resident Lounge with Full Bar & Kitchen Facilities
505 N. Figueroa St., Los Angeles, CA 90012
Pricing and availability are subject to change.
